 Exotic oriental rhythms and a unique blend of acoustic and electronic textures are only some of the features that define BUDDHA SOUNDS original style.

 Born as a project, BUDDHA SOUNDS is now one of the most important downtempo and chill out bands, both nationally and internationally, even in Spain, well-known because of its old electronic-music tradition and culture.

 Lead by the outstanding Argentine producer ALEX SEOAN, BUDDHA SOUNDS present their sixth studio album entitled "GUEST IN THE UNIVERSE", preceeded by five successful volumes.

 The band has performed in the most important venues in Latin America. During the show, the sound, combined with visual effects, harmonizes a magical night, an electrosensorial experience.

 The result is a perfect synchronicity between mysticism, exquisite music, sensual oriental sounds and the captivating appeal of Hindu dance.
